note.p: Death: 59 St Vincent Street, Glasgow (24 December 1872)
Research Field: Engineering, engineering education, physical science
Memberships: FRSE; Scottish Society of Arts; Glasgow Philosophical Society; AICE
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1872-1873 vol 21 pp i-iv
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
F C Moon, 'Robert Willis and Franz Reuleaux: pioneers in the theory of machines' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 209-230
